value:
$nMPID_カトリーヌ|There aren't many people I trust to
have my back—but I know I can count
on Shamir.

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|People in Dagda marry whoever they
want—regardless of gender. You OK,
partner? You're blushing.

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Whaddaya think of the swimsuit?
Not bad, right? I wonder what Lady
Rhea would say about it.

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|I'm not used to this kind of outfit...but
at least it's easy to move around in.
Leave cleaning up the beach to me.

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Catherine's incredibly skilled, but
when we're on missions related to
Rhea it's like she's wearing blinders.

Summer tidings from your friend
$Nf. Here.

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Bright sun, pleasant breeze...
I'm rarin' to go!

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Finally getting used to working in
this outfit. Bring on the next job.
$nMPID_比翼シャミア|It's not like I was slacking off...

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|This is gonna be a great summer!
...Right? C'mon, Shamir, give me
some enthusiasm.

I'm Thunder Catherine, and this
here's my partner, Shamir! We're
ready for a day at the beach!

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Just how long are you going to swim,
Catherine? It's practically sundown.$k$p$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Yeah, that's why I want to stay
out here. Look at the orange sparkles
on the water—it's perfect!$k$pWhy don't you get in too? We're on
vacation! Gotta live it up a little!$k$p$nMPID_比翼シャミア|You're frolicking enough for both of
us. Think I'll just enjoy the show.$k$p$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Hey, I'm not here for your
entertainment. But fine. Won't stop
me from having a good time!
$nMPID_二人|You ready?
$nMPID_二人|"Keep up." "I know, I know."
$nMPID_比翼シャミア|This should be fun.
$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Had enough yet?
Urgh... Leg cramp...
*exert* Looking good!
Get it together!
"Too hot..." "Heh! Baby."
"Water's great!" "It's fine."
"Don't you think we're showing too much skin?" "What, worried about a little sunburn?"
Ahh...
No dawdling.
Isn't this nice?

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Ahhh... Blue sky, clear water, white
sand... If this isn't heaven, I don't
know what is.

Ah. See that rock? How about it,
Shamir? Want to see who can swim
over there the fastest?

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Absolutely not. I've waited too long
for this vacation to waste it with
even more training.

I'm gonna take a nap in the shade
over there. You can swim to your
little rock by yourself.

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Aw, well, aren't you a spoilsport?
Come on, swimming by myself isn't
nearly as fun.

Hm... OK, what if the race had some
stakes?
$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Why would I agree to that?

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Because if you beat me, I'll treat you
to a drink or something. Whatever
you want.

And if I beat you, then... Well, same
deal. Not bad, right?

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Pass. I'm not a child—if I want
something, I can just buy it myself.

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Oh, come on! Then what would
you want?

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Hmm... If I had to say, it'd probably
be some peace and quiet.

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Got it! Then, if you win, I'll go
swimming by myself. That work
for you?

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|Wait. Are you saying I have to win the
right to spend time away from you?
$nMPID_カトリーヌ|Obviously! We are partners, after all.

$nMPID_比翼シャミア|But that's just for work and... *sigh*
Arguing won't get me anywhere.

$nMPID_カトリーヌ|There we go. Now, if we're doing
this, you'd better take it seriously!
Let's go, partner!
